environmentalSimulator
Class Thermal

java.lang.Object
  environmentalSimulator.LocalizedPhenomenon
      environmentalSimulator.Thermal
All Implemented Interfaces:
MeteorologicalPhenomenon
public class Thermal
extends LocalizedPhenomenon

This class represents the thermal columns as a localized meteorological phenomenon. It allows one to create a thermal with default values, to modify its radius, coordinates, maximum speed and height, and then to calculate the wind at a precise location.

Field Summary

          The default height in meters chosen to be implemented when a thermal is created.
